p.k: A look at how key moments in NBA history could have gone differently. What if Robert Horry missed his game winner against the Kings (2002)? What if Gregg Popovich was fired from the Spurs before their first title (1998)? What if Allan Houston's shot bounced out (1999)? What if Robert Horry didn't hip-check Steve Nash (2007)? What if the Magic didn't trade Chris Webber (1993)?
